CN.content:

| M |

The two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PQCDTB (which dissolved in general organic solvents)
2. M (with a molar mass of 49.8 kg/mol)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Sure, here's the updated table with only the valid material names:

The only material name mentioned in the paragraph is PQCDTB. The entity "M" is not a material name, but rather an abbreviation for "molar mass".
